column4: Latest; The campaign on the prevention and suppression of forest crimes continues.------On 21 July 2019 forces burned vehicles and wood used in illegal logging at 8 locations in Preah Vihear
column7: Kratie and Pursat.------43 people were arrested and 15.632 cubic meters was taken by the forestry administration. ------11 motor vehicles and 1 processing units were destroyed with fire. ------PPR
